mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_grade( SEQ, S_NUM, S_NAME, S_KOR, S_ENG, S_MATH, S_SUM, S_AVG, S_US ) VALUES ( SEQ_GRADE.NEXTVAL, #{s_num}, #{s_name}, #{s_kor}, #{s_eng}, #{s_math}, #{s_sum}, #{s_avg}, #{s_us} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_ems SET s_num = #{s_num}, s_name = #{s_name}, s_kor = #{s_kor}, s_eng = #{s_eng}, s_math = #{s_math}, s_sum = #{s_sum}, s_avg = #{s_avg}, s_us = #{s_us} WHERE seq = #{seq}
